content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_axe
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 58, "index": 18}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 11, "index": 37}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 38}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 11, "index": 39}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 17, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a golden axe, I need to first craft a gold ingot. The gold ingot requires placing 9 gold blocks in the crafting grid. I have 1 gold block at slot 21, so I will first move it into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_axe
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 58, "index": 18}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 11, "index": 37}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 38}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 11, "index": 39}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 17, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the gold block has been moved into the crafting grid, I can craft the gold ingot by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

thought: Now that I have crafted the gold ingot, I can craft the golden axe. The golden axe requires placing 2 gold ingots and 1 stick in the crafting grid. I have 1 stick at slot 28, so I will first move it into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
